fields.label: Testimonial Quote
fields.name: acf_testimonial_quote
fields.default_value: This is an amazing product that has completely transformed my workflow.

fields.label: Author Name
fields.name: acf_testimonial_author_name
fields.instructions: Enter the name of the person giving the testimonial.

fields.label: Author Title/Company
fields.name: acf_testimonial_author_title
fields.instructions: Enter the author's title or company name.

fields.label: Author Image
fields.name: acf_testimonial_author_image
fields.instructions: Upload an image from the media library.

fields.label: Or Image URL
fields.name: acf_testimonial_author_image_url
fields.instructions: Alternatively, enter a direct image URL. This takes priority over the uploaded image.

fields.label: Rating (1-5 stars)
fields.name: acf_testimonial_rating
fields.instructions: Enter a rating from 1 to 5 stars.

fields.label: Custom CSS Class
fields.name: acf_testimonial_class
fields.instructions: Add custom CSS class(es) for styling.

fields.label: Inline Styles
fields.name: acf_testimonial_inline
fields.instructions: Add inline CSS styles if needed.
